snippet: More and more of the country’s finest artisanal chocolate markers are producing caramels. So which ones should you give your Valentine?
lead_paragraph: More and more of the country’s finest artisanal chocolate markers are producing caramels. So which ones should you give your Valentine?

headline.seo: Chocolate Caramels Worthy of Your Sweetheart
